Frame.Dialog:
You find yourself facing a [mirror]sparkling mirror[/color] - it gives you a choice between several mystical artifacts to aid you in your journey.
Which one will you choose?

The [mirror]sparkling mirror[/color] beckons, vibrating as it manifests your chosen artifact. It lands softly in your hands, prompting [mirror]the mirror[/color] and its surroundings to dissipate into thin air.
